playlists.name: Team Arena
playlists.description: Face off against ranked teams of 4 in Slayer, Capture the Flag, Strongholds, and Oddball. Ground Pound and Spartan Charge are disabled. The Motion Sensor range is increased and only detects gunshots and Spartan Abilities.

playlists.name: Slayer
playlists.description: Work as a team of 4 to vanquish your opponents.

playlists.name: Breakout
playlists.description: Now with full shields, new starting weapons, improved maps, and more. Breakout has evolved!

playlists.name: SWAT
playlists.description: No shields, no motion tracker.  Aim for the Head!

playlists.name: Free-for-All
playlists.description: It's you against everyone else.  Slay your way to victory.

playlists.name: Pre-Release Arena
playlists.description: To optimize the early access experience, we are limiting the number of multiplayer playlists.  We will have far more playlists available at launch.

playlists.name: Shotty Snipers
playlists.description: Spray and slay with a Sniper and Shotgun.

playlists.name: Social Doubles
playlists.description: 2v2 Slayer. 25 points to win. Teamwork is necessary for victory.

playlists.name: Big Team Battle
playlists.description: Slayer, Capture the Flag, and Strongholds for teams of 8 on 8.

playlists.name: Rumble Rockets
playlists.description: Explosions everywhere. Celebrate this weekend by firing off some rockets!

playlists.name: Social Snipers
playlists.description: Battle against a team of Spartans in a true test of marksmanship. Sniper Rifles only!

playlists.name: Social Arena Breakout
playlists.description: Breakout with full shields and damage on Arena maps with custom weapon layouts.

playlists.name: HCS 2018
playlists.description: Play the official map and mode settings featured in the 2018 season of the Halo Championship Series. Spartan Charge and Ground Pound are disabled. All-new Forge maps, as well as Oddball, have been added. Good luck, have fun!
